name: John doe
review: Works great with one big problem. You can not trun on the TV.In order for the app to work,you need the TV on.Is't the main purpose of a remote app to aid you in using the TV if you lost or broken the original TV remote? Once it is on , its works great.

name: Jr. Alexender
review: Excellence picture/shape/size/! Perfect for family events and sports! My little 2 year old loves Blues clues and all of the colors on the TV just pop out every time we watch! Amazing TV upgrade for sure ! On top of that , the sound quality is like a theater! Its amazing.

name: Provashish Roy
review: Sony for the win, I was looking at Samsung Qled but the best Buy association asked me what i was going to use the TV for and i told him primarily gaming he directed me to the sony tv and i was blown away amazing picture, clarity. But these device medium quality i think.

name: Black Devil
review: Great Tv ! Exactly what i needed it for.4k rez for the PS5 and a great paring for my old Yamaha Tv . Just measure the width of the TV stand before you buy. You will need a very wide entertainment center, if you do not you will end up with a ghetto setup like me.

name: Andre Rassel
review: This was a big purchase for us but we love this tv. Looks great. Watching movies and shows in 4K is so much better. So many apps to download. I do wish I the tv had more memory for more apps but I used a thumb drive for that.

name: Roy Tonmoy
review: The performance of our new 55” Sony Bravia tv is excellent so far.  Beautiful picture and very good sound without a sound bar. We have not had the opportunity to try all of the features such as downloading of APPS. Time will tell.  Hopefully this tv will give us long service.

name: Nishit doe
review: The clarity and sound is great! You can change the picture to different modes very easily.It picks up voice commands easy. It’s fast too. The tv itself is a good size for my living room. Price is a little expensive but the brand is very popular and the features are high quality.

name: Grace chappel
review: Oh my!!  What a great tv.  Sony.. Great motion scenes!Incredible picture coloring.   So pleasurable to watch. Never better.Just sit back and be prepared for amazing experiences!!!

name: Ainstain De
review: Love this Tv! Got it for my bedroom solely for watching movies in 4K-HDR & Dolby Vision. I watch a lot of physical discs like Joker, The Lord of the Rings Trilogy, The Dark Knight, Aquaman, and Tenet and it looks crisp and terrific! I did adjust some settings like the Black Levels
